Lagos National Stadium bụ ámá egwuregwu nwere ọtụtụ ebumnuche na Surulere, Lagos State, Nigeria, nke nwere ogige igwu mmiri Olympic na ogige egwuregwu nwere ọtụtụ zubere nke a na-eji eme egwuregwu, rugby, basketball, volleyball, table tennis, ịgba mgba na egwuregwu ịkụ ọkpọ
A na-ejikarị ya eme ihe maka egwuregwu bọọlụ ruo n'afọ 2004
Ọ kwadoro ọtụtụ asọmpi mba ụwa gụnyere 1980 African Cup of Nations final, 2000 iko mba nke African Cup of Nation final, na FIFA World Cup qualifying matches
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka isi ámá egwuregwu maka afọ 1973 All-Africa Games.
Mgbe e wuru ámá egwuregwu ahụ N'afọ 1972, ọ nwere ikike nke 55,000
E belatara ikike ahụ ruo 45,000 N'afọ 1999
Ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị bịara bụ 85,000 ma were ya na egwuregwu ikpeazụ iko mbà nke Afrịka n'afọ 1980 n'etiti Nigeria na Algeria.
N'ihi ihe ndị a na-amaghị, a hapụrụ nke kachasị na ama egwuregwu nke national stadium ka ọ daa kemgbe mmalite afọ 2000

Ọ kwadoro egwuregwu mba ikpeazụ n'afọ 2004, na egwuregwu bọọlụ kwagara na Teslim Balogun Stadium dị nso. A na-eji ya eme ihe ugbu a mgbe ụfọdụ maka nnọkọ okpukpe ma ụmụ okorobịa na ndị squatters weghaara ya. N'afọ 2009, National Sports Commission malitere mgbalị jikọrọ aka iji weghachite ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'ọnọdụ ụwa.
